sources.title: Klondike Fury (1942) EDMUND LOWE â™¥ LUCILE FAIRBANKS
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Edmund Lowe, Lucile Fairbanks, Ralph Morgan, Cyclone the Dog
Director: William K. Howard
Music Score: Edward Kay

A disgraced neurosurgeon flees to Alaska, where his plane crashes in the frozen wilderness.

TRIVIA: Lucile Fairbanks had a 1/2 dozen credited roles beginning in 1940 before saying goodbye to Hollywood after Klondike Fury. The actress was the daughter of Robert Payne Fairbanks, and the niece of actor Douglas Fairbanks, Sr.

metadata.Plot: A neurosurgeon is thrown out of the medical profession after he performs a daring but unsuccessful surgery. He flees to Alaska, where his plane crashes in the frozen wilderness.
metadata.Actors: Edmund Lowe, Lucile Fairbanks, William Henry
